channel.title: Wireless net send?
channel.description: okay soo i was at my friends house and he has 2 computers in the same room hooked up by a wire not wireless but a normal modem, and i got it to send him about 50 messages every time i clicked my batch file by using net send. but when i try and do it at my house to my downstairs computer with my wireless modem i cant find any other computers on my network, i tried net send * "hello" and that didnt work and they are both in the same work group i enabled messaging on both comps but it still doesnt seem to work. soo if someone could help thatd be greatt

item.title: Wireless net send?
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

why not just use your Network Places (or what have you)…just FTP the files over

Read full topic

item.title: Wireless net send?
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

okay soo i was at my friends house and he has 2 computers in the same room hooked up by a wire not wireless but a normal modem, and i got it to send him about 50 messages every time i clicked my batch file by using net send. but when i try and do it at my house to my downstairs computer with my wireless modem i cant find any other computers on my network, i tried net send * “hello” and that didnt work and they are both in the same work group i enabled messaging on both comps but it still doesnt seem to work. soo if someone could help thatd be greatt

Read full topic
